info.name: YouTube - Minimal [by daylo]
info.description:
YouTube looks so much better without the clutter. Minimal design.
All feedback accepted.
No futher support - released under CC0 - see profile
info.additionalInfo: Version 0.7 Removed more adverts + suggestions, fixed some shadows and edited the upload button. See new screenshot. BUG - Video scrolls in small mode. Fix - Use "Theater mode" instead. It's the same size.
